Dialogue: Oh, hello. Are you here to read? I enjoy the company. Just be careful not to get sludge all over everything.

I come out this way when I have some free time from my work. I keep whatever technology is left in this city running. The market district is nice but nowadays it can be dangerous, with all the chaos and whatever.
I was actually a software developer before the Eye came. I never would have imagined myself to be a bookworm.
This city has a good number of bookstores which are pretty much untouched so I never run out of stuff to read.
Trying to write out some of my own stuff but who knows if any of it is any good. The world is pretty short on writers so sure as hell am not getting peer reviewed any time soon.
Shakespeare actually is pretty easy to read. I just literally have nothing else to do some days. I tried my hand at some science articles too and now quantum physics almost makes sense.
I, um… I lost my fair share of people. Been reading a good amount of religious stuff since the
Er, wait, do you even know how to read? Not sure literature is a priority for vengeful gods.
